5. Thanks for your question!

1. The Main Risks of Dual Investment
The primary risk of Dual Investment is opportunity cost, driven by market volatility. If the asset's price moves dramatically beyond your target, you can miss out on significant profits. For example, with a "Sell High" product, you might be forced to sell your BTC at $70,000, only to watch it rally to $85,000. Conversely, a "Buy Low" contract could make you buy an asset for $65,000 when its market price has crashed to $58,000. This risk is amplified because your funds are locked until the settlement date, preventing you from reacting to sudden market changes and locking in an unfavorable conversion.

2. Effects of a Long-Term Sideways Market
In a prolonged sideways market, Dual Investment can be highly effective. If your target price is never met, your contracts won't execute. Instead, you'll repeatedly receive your initial asset back plus a high-interest APR, allowing you to steadily accumulate more of your chosen crypto or stablecoin. However, the hidden risk is complacency. Sideways markets often end with a sharp breakout. A sudden price surge could trigger your final "Sell High" contract right before a major rally, causing you to miss the upside you were waiting for. In this environment, contract execution opportunities are low, making the product feel like a pure yield tool, which can mask the underlying risk of a sudden trend change.

3. Who Is Dual Investment For?
Dual Investment is best suited for investors with a patient strategy and clear price targets. This includes long-term HODLers looking to earn extra yield on their assets while setting a desirable "sell high" price, as well as patient buyers wanting to earn interest on their stablecoins while waiting for a specific "buy low" entry point. 

Crucially, the ideal user understands and accepts the risk of opportunity cost. They are comfortable forgoing potentially larger gains from a sudden market rally in exchange for a guaranteed, high-yield return on their own terms.

*As always, the above is food for thought and shouldn't be treated as financial advice. Remember to do your own research and ensure Dual Investment products are suitable for you.

4. Yes! Binance always encourages users to learn about tokenomics as part of getting involved in crypto. 

We recently introduced first-of-its-kind Locked Addresses and Platform Concentration Indicator, to promote greater token transparency and strengthen user education. You can learn more here 👉 https://t.co/o5Kz8ZWv7L 

We keep working on new products and features to make it easier for users to find token info so they can make more informed trading choices.

3. Thanks for asking! By receiving earlier this year full approval for the takeover of Sim;paul – a licensed broker-dealer authorized by the Central Bank of Brazil, Binance is now in a privileged position and gives it greater leverage to make adjustments that may become necessary as a result of the regulatory process for the cryptocurrency market and virtual asset service providers (VASPs), which is at an advanced stage in the country. 

Thus, it mitigates risks such as halting operations or having to start the rigorous and costly licensing process from scratch.

Binance was already operating in compliance with the regulatory requirements in the country as a global exchange, and with the approval became the first crypto exchange to have a broker-dealer license in Brazil.

Binance Alpha is the first platform to feature Tradoor (TRADOOR) , with Alpha trading opening on September 4, 2025, at 12:00 (UTC).

🌟 Once trading begins, users with at least 220 Binance Alpha Points can claim an airdrop of 50 TRADOOR tokens on a first-come, first-served basis. If the reward pool is not fully distributed, the score threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour.

Please note that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must confirm their claims on the Alpha Events page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be deemed that users have given up claiming the airdrop.

2. Regarding the transparency of CreatorPad’s campaign results and the Mindshare Leaderboard rankings you mentioned, Binance Square maintains a high level of openness and auditability in this regard. 

The CreatorPad creator Mindshare scoring mechanism is completely transparent, and the relevant details and scoring criteria can be found on the CreatorPad FAQ and T&Cs page: https://t.co/JkNHaeJzOU. 

In the scoring process, we place particular emphasis on three core dimensions: creativity, professionalism, and relevance of content.

Additionally, users can refer to the detailed guide explaining the analysis of high-quality content structure and the scoring mechanism: Introduction to the Open-Source Scoring Mechanism of the Binance Square CreatorPad Leaderboard: https://t.co/bDkDAkRptw. This material helps participants gain a deeper understanding of the scoring logic behind the leaderboard, which facilitates effectively improving their Mindshare scores for greater rewards and recognition.

Regarding strategies to optimize participation, creators should focus on consistently producing high-quality, professional content that aligns well with the target themes, actively engage with the community, and enhance the relevance and dissemination of their content to boost their Mindshare scores and rankings.

Looking ahead, Binance plans to continuously expand CreatorPad’s functionalities, strengthen its integration with other products in the Binance ecosystem, improve user participation experience and incentive mechanisms, and build a richer creator ecosystem that helps creators gain more exposure and earning opportunities.

If you or your team have further questions, please feel free to follow our official channels for the latest updates.

Earlier this week, Binance announced the launch of the the Binance Wallet Extension (Beta)! 

It allows users to securely manage their crypto assets, interact with dApps, and explore Web3 from your web browser. 

Note, that this is a beta release, which is an early version of the wallet extension with limited features. 

More capabilities will be added in the near future. You can check out the full announcement here: https://t.co/V6kVq0QzhB

Please note that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must confirm their claims on the Alpha Events page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be deemed that users have given up claiming the airdrop.
